original_text: All the sailors of other ships will leave their ships. The sailors and their captains will stand on the shore of the sea. All the sailors of other ships will leave their ships. The sailors and their captains will stand on the shore of the sea. All the sailors of other ships will leave their ships.
korean_text: 노를 잡은 모든 자와 사공과 바다의 선장들이 다 배에서 내려 언덕에 서서

sentences.original_text: All the sailors of other ships will leave their ships
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 배의 모든 선원들은 그들의 배를 떠날 것이다

sentences.original_text: The sailors and their captains will stand on the shore of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 선원들과 그들의 선장들은 바닷가에 서 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: All the sailors of other ships will leave their ships
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 배의 모든 선원들은 그들의 배를 떠날 것이다

sentences.original_text: The sailors and their captains will stand on the shore of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 선원들과 그들의 선장들은 바닷가에 서 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: All the sailors of other ships will leave their ships
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 배의 모든 선원들은 그들의 배를 떠날 것이다
